scripts.chrome: npx json-merger -p -am concat -o src/manifest.json manifest.json manifest-chrome.json
scripts.firefox: npx json-merger -p -am concat -o src/manifest.json manifest.json manifest-firefox.json
scripts.build-chrome: npm run chrome && npx web-ext build -n {name}-chrome-{version}.zip -o -s src
scripts.build-firefox: npm run firefox && npx web-ext build -n {name}-firefox-{version}.zip -o -s src
scripts.build-all: npm run build-chrome && npm run build-firefox
